agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Insurance TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 9, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Eddie Lucio III HB 283 Perez | et al. Relating to a disclosure regarding flood coverage under a commercial or residential property insurance policy. HB 3306 Smithee Relating to the disclosure of information concerning the corporate governance structure of certain insurers and related entities; providing an administrative penalty. HB 3056 Lambert | et al. Relating to operating requirements for farm mutual insurance companies related to insurance in force on rural property. HB 2151 Muñoz, Jr. Relating to the use of extrapolation by a health maintenance organization or an insurer to audit claims. HB 1897 Bonnen, Greg Relating to dispute resolution for certain claims arising under insurance policies issued by the Fair Access to Insurance Requirements (FAIR) Plan Association; authorizing fees. HB 3345 Price Relating to health benefit coverage provided by certain health benefit plans for telemedicine medical services and telehealth services. HB 4127 Hinojosa | et al. Relating to the Healthy Texas Program; authorizing a fee. HB 2289 Ortega | et al. Relating to the regulation of amusement rides by the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation. HB 217 Gervin-Hawkins Relating to health benefit plan coverage for hair prostheses for cancer patients. HB 317 Raymond Relating to the use of clinical decision support software and laboratory benefits management programs by physicians and health care providers in connection with provision of clinical laboratory services to certain managed care plan enrollees. HB 3960 Hunter | et al. Relating to rate filings by the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 3961 Hunter | et al. Relating to rate filings by the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 3962 Hunter | et al. Relating to rate filings by the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 1772 Middleton Relating to rate filings by the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 3038 Middleton Relating to reinsurance for catastrophic losses provided to the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association by member insurers. HB 3123 Middleton Relating to flood insurance coverage requirements for insurance policies issued by the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 2582 Lucio III Relating to required notice of the cost and health benefit plan coverage of newborn screening tests. HB 3058 Johnson, Julie Relating to prior authorization for prescription drug benefits related to the treatment of AIDS and HIV. HB 1880 Davis, Sarah Relating to health benefit plan provider networks; providing an administrative penalty; authorizing an assessment. HB 1348 Clardy | et al. Relating to certain insurance practices with respect to repair of motor vehicles. HB 2682 Collier Relating to health benefit coverage for certain fertility preservation services under certain health benefit plans. HB 2102 Capriglione | et al. Relating to the payment of insurance deductibles related to property insurance policies; creating criminal offenses. HB 3632 Herrero Relating to policyholder approval for certain windstorm and hail insurance rate changes. HB 3633 Herrero Relating to the board of directors of the Texas Windstorm Insurance Association. HB 2536 Oliverson Relating to transparency related to drug costs. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. Bills deleted after last posting: HB 3484 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
